verses.roman:
tabe sanātana prabhura caraṇe dhariyā
dainya vinati kare dante tṛṇa lañā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; sanātana—Sanātana Gosvāmī; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; caraṇe—the lotus feet; dhariyā—catching; dainya—humility; vinati—bowing; kare—does; dante—in the teeth; tṛṇa—a straw; lañā—taking.
translation: Putting a straw in his mouth and bowing down, Sanātana Gosvāmī clasped the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and humbly spoke as follows.
